hero.p: Naše restaurace Invitaly spoléhá zejména na dovezených produktech z Itálie, abychom dosáhli nejlepší autentičnosti italské kuchyně.

about.p1: Illo voluptatibus laboriosam qui totam quasi velit assumenda sint mollitia dolore odio quidem, ut repudiandae cumque. Ipsum laudantium quia adipisci fugit ex praesentium nihil eveniet? Esse doloremque animi in facere.

menu.p: The Invitaly kitchen relies mostly on imported products from Italy to meet the authenticity of Italian cuisine.

review.q: Excellent, unassuming and wonderful find. Great variety and fine value tasting menu. Exciting food with high quality presentation, service and inventiveness.
review.caption: —Aldous Huxley, Source

pizzeria.p: Visit our sister reastaurant to taste delicious Italian pizzas and pastas
